A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So good.  When I see the 56% audience rating\, my conspiracy theory bells go off.  I have yet to talk to anyone who hasn't LOVED it.\n\nAs for SW:TLJ\, I can't begin to go express my love for the movie.  Great performances from the entire cast.  Maybe the most beautiful SW of the entire series.  Unlike SW:TFA\, this is completely original with twists you do NOT see coming.  Please ignore the silly bad RT audience rating\, the critics have this one right.  Go see it.
